ISSUE.TITLE: CLI: list should not include --id because it is confusing and that is what get is for
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Bug Report ##### SUMMARY <!-- Briefly describe the problem. --> It was discussed that the fact that `awx <resource> list` accepts `--id` as argument is confusing, because most other actions take it as a positional argument. In help text is shows up like this: ``` --id INTEGER only list instances with the specified id ``` But this only gets one item, which is the same as `awx <resource> get <id>`. RESOLUTION: Remove `--id` from `list` commands
